sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './BridgeAppProfile.css'; const BridgeAppProfile = ({ userData, onBack }) => { const profileBadges = [ { name: 'Code Master', icon: '💻', color: '#FFD700', earned: true }, { name: 'AI Explorer', icon: '🤖', color: '#8A2BE2', earned: true }, { name: 'Team Player', icon: '👥', color: '#00FF00', earned: false }, { name: 'Quick Learner', icon: '⚡', color: '#00BFFF', earned: true } ]; const userSkills = ['React', 'Node.js', 'Python', 'JavaScript', 'MongoDB', 'AWS', 'Docker', 'Git']; const recentActivities = [ { action: 'Completed Course: Advanced React', time: '2 hours ago', icon: '📚' }, { action: 'Earned Badge: Code Master', time: '1 day ago', icon: '🏆' }, { action: 'Joined Team: Web Developers', time: '3 days ago', icon: '👥' }, { action: 'Updated Profile Information', time: '1 week ago', icon: '✏️' } ]; return (

Bridge-App Profile

Your integrated student profile

{/* Profile Header Card */}
{ e.target.src = 'data:image/svg+xml;base64,'; }} />

{userData?.name || 'Student Name'}

{userData?.email || 'student@example.com'}

2,847
Profile Views
12
Achievements
Level 8
Current Level
{/* Personal Information */}

👤 Personal Information

{userData?.email || 'student@example.com'}
Bangalore, India
{userData?.college || 'University Name'}
{userData?.graduationYear || '2025'}
{/* Skills */}

💡 Skills & Expertise

{userSkills.map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))}
{/* Achievements & Badges */}

🏆 Achievements & Badges

{profileBadges.map((badge, index) => (
{badge.icon}
{badge.name}
{badge.earned ? 'Earned' : 'In Progress'}
))}
{/* Recent Activity */}

📈 Recent Activity

{recentActivities.map((activity, index) => (
{activity.icon}
{activity.action}
{activity.time}
))}
); }; export default BridgeAppProfile;
